com.craftar
Class CraftARSDK

java.lang.Object
  com.craftar.CraftARSDK

public class CraftARSDK
extends java.lang.Object

The CraftARSDK is the module that let's you access all the other modules. Through it, you can retrieve the CraftARCloudRecognition and CraftARCamera instances.

Constructor Summary
CraftARSDK()
           
 
Method Summary
static CraftARCamera getCamera()
          Used only to take pictures for the single-shot mode.
static CraftARCloudRecognition getCloudRecognition()
          Used to manage the calls to the cloud, and to use finder-mode
static CraftARCloudRecognition getCloudRecognition(Activity activity)
          Use this if you just want to use the connect call, without using the camera.
static void init(Context context, CraftARActivity activity)
          Initialize all the components of the SDK.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

CraftARSDK

public CraftARSDK()
Method Detail

init

public static void init(Context context,
                        CraftARActivity activity)
Initialize all the components of the SDK. Do this before obtaining the components (getCloudRecognition(), getCamera()). If you don't need to use the camera, you don't need to call this function.

getCloudRecognition

public static CraftARCloudRecognition getCloudRecognition()
Used to manage the calls to the cloud, and to use finder-mode

getCloudRecognition

public static CraftARCloudRecognition getCloudRecognition(Activity activity)
Use this if you just want to use the connect call, without using the camera.

getCamera

public static CraftARCamera getCamera()
Used only to take pictures for the single-shot mode.
